metadata.name: Original prototype design of the Audemars Piguet Royal Oak with accompanying NFT Circa 1972
metadata.description:
THIS ITEM COMPRISES OF A PHYSICAL ARTWORK AND AN NFT AND SHOULD NOT BE SOLD SEPARATELY. PLEASE CHECK THE SOTHEBY’S DISCORD CHANNEL TO CONFIRM IF THEY HOLD THE PHYSICAL ARTWORK BEFORE BUYING.

Certificate of Authenticity:
https://gateway.arweave.net/2MIeCOi8K7S_FHFqChlaCS_tGjvMDIp7GKs3L3qwLqc

Storage Agreement: 
https://gateway.arweave.net/JkfH-xgS8OsdeXhy7-13z6jkHC6jePBR_wj1Wu7WuMM

Gérald Genta: Icon of Time sale series, celebrating the most famous watch designer of all time and the man behind some of the world’s most sought-after watches. “The Picasso of watchmaking” transformed the industry with his visionary designs that continue to set the gold standard today, producing pieces that have become the biggest bestsellers of watchmaking history.

For the first time, and on the 50th anniversary of the Royal Oak and the 10th anniversary of Gérald Genta’s passing, the Genta archive of exceptional designs is to be opened. The sale series will include one hundred original designs encompassing his most iconic timepieces, some never-before-seen private commissions and a selection of innovative, forward-thinking, and unique watch designs.

To continue Genta’s legacy of innovation, and in partnership with Evelyne Genta, the Maestro’s life and business partner, each original artwork is paired with a unique NFT. Each NFT features an artistic digital replica of the design, a certificate of authenticity, and for select pieces, fascinating never-before-seen multimedia content.
